welcome_message_body: Welcome to Saidpur, Bangladesh! Nestled in the picturesque Rajshahi Division, this charming city is known for its rich cultural heritage, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant markets. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Saidpur has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Easi Recipe
restaurants.description: Easi Recipe is a indonesian restaurant located in Rangpur.
restaurants.address: Shahjalal mia, Taluk tamput talepara, Nagormirgong, Rangpur - 5403

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Saidpur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
